device.Description: A professional mobile workstation with NVIDIA RTX professional graphics for CAD, 3D rendering, and data science.
device.YesProcessor: Intel Core i9 delivers workstation-class performance

test_scenarios: Can I run AutoCAD and SolidWorks?
Is this good for machine learning?
Is this overkill for just Office work?

expected_responses.cad: Excellent - RTX 3500 Ada is certified for CAD/3D applications, 32GB RAM handles large assemblies
expected_responses.ml: Good - RTX 3500 Ada provides CUDA cores for ML training, but desktop GPUs would be faster
expected_responses.video_4k: Yes - 4K OLED display, 32GB RAM, and professional GPU handle 4K video editing workflows
expected_responses.best_for: CAD, 3D modeling, video production, data science, professional creative work
